p: Syzygium aromaticum essential oil and eugenol presented concentration-dependent antioxidant activity, as observed in the graph that relates S. aromaticum essential oil and eugenol concentration to the percentage of inhibition of the ABTS radical ( Figure 2). The calculated EC 50 was 78.98 µg/mL for S. aromaticum essential oil and 12.66 µg/mL for eugenol.
